org.lwjgl.opencl

Class cl_device_topology_amd

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opencl.cl_device_topology_amd

  • public final class cl_device_topology_amd
extends java.lang.Object
    The struct returned by CL10.clGetDeviceInfo(long, int, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) with param_name set to AMDDeviceTopology.CL_DEVICE_TOPOLOGY_AMD.
